docs.text: Python Project Template ¶ A basic Python project template. Just what I want to start projects with. Base Stuff ¶ The things and stuff it does! Bash scripts to handle generic work install, run test, make docs, flake8, clear cache, autoflake, isort easy to create a start app bash script requirements folder requirements.txt references prd.txt install script installs both prd and dev libraries pre-commit config setup.cfg for pytest, black, isort, flake8,ect.. gunicorn config if needed .env_sample for external configuration cp .env_sample .env docker simple dockerfile docker-compose
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text: A basic Python project template. Just what I want to start projects with.

docs.text: Changelog ¶ All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file. The format is based on Keep a Changelog Todo ¶ [Unreleased] ¶ RegEx patterns [0.0.1] - initial work ¶ Added ¶ basic setup dockerfile and compose scripts to handle functions configuration for gunicorn and setup .env_sample to start with mkdocs with material theme + script to build and publish README, CHANGLOG, LICENSE, and CONTRIBUTION
docs.title: Contributing

docs.text: Contributing ¶ Please feel to contribute to this project. Adding common functions is the intent and if you have one to add or improve an existing it is greatly appreciated. Ways to Contribute! ¶ Add or improve a function Add or improve documentation Add or improve Tests Report or fix a bug
docs.title: Contributing
